itunes:title: Episode 069: Miranda Leevald (feat. Josh Cornillon)
title: Episode 069: Miranda Leevald (feat. Josh Cornillon)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 69 of CEREBRO, Connor and returning guest Josh Cornillon slither about with Miranda Leevald, the serpentine Stacy X! Created by Joe Casey and Tom Raney, Stacy employs her pheromonal power over the endocrine system in her career as a sex worker at the X-Ranch, a mutant brothel in Nevada. Rescued by the X-Men from a vicious attack, she becomes a prominent member of the Uncanny X-Men field team during Casey's brief tenure on the title, before exiting abruptly under the following writer, Chuck Austen. After decades of shabby treatment since, the character has found new purpose on Krakoa.

The CEREBRO character file on Stacy X begins at 1:19:32.

(Content Advisory: Stacy's story includes sexual violence including implied child sex abuse, domestic violence, survival sex work, torture, and transphobia directed at another character.)



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
